entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.2°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
